item.description:
There is a change of venue for this month only. If you can make it, please attend a forum for the candidates for the Cambridge City Council. It should be very interesting! Here are the details:

PDC/DFA candidates forum. The forum will take place on Tuesday, August 2, at the Cambridge Senior Center, 806 Massachusetts Ave. The
publicly announced starting time is 6:45 pm; we hope to start at 7:00.
item.name: The Boston Townhall August Meetup
